section.title: Drivetrain Class Reference

listitem.para: Use drivetrain ArcadeDrive to move the chasis.
Invert direction of the right motor group.
Invert direction of the left motor group.
Publishes all motors to the dashboard.
Gets the average of the right encoders.
Gets the average of the left encoders.
Gets the average of the all encoders.
Invert the direction of the right encoders.
Invert the direction of the left encoders.
Publish the value of the encoders to the dashboard.
Gets the current angle of the gyro in degrees.
Get the gyro angle in radians.
Invert the direction of the gyro.
Publish the value of the gyro to the dashboard.
Publish the angle in radians to the dashboard.
Sets the drivetrain to a given heading.
Turns the drievtrain to a given angle.
Moves the drivetrain to a given coordinate in meters.
Set drivetrain to a specific distance from the target.
Set drivetrain to a specific angle from the target.
Get the absolute angle from a coordinate independent of quadrant.
Resets the Align with target PID.
Resets the Distance to target PID.
Prints the move PID error to the dashboard.
Prints the turn PID error to the dashboard.
Prints the move to PID error to the dashboard.
Prints the align PID error to the dashboard.
Prints the distance PID error to the dashboard.
Prints the current coordinates to the dashboard.
